metadata.title: CVE-2020-22019 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Buffer Overflow vulnerability in FFmpeg 4.2 at convolution_y_10bit in libavfilter/vf_vmafmotion.c, which could let a remote malicious user cause a Denial of Service.

criterions.comment: ffmpeg package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
